title: Mzee Ali: The Biography of an African Slave-Raider turned Askari and Scout
description: Mzee Ali Kalikilima was born near the present-day town of Tabora in western Tanzania, probably in the 1870s to black Muslim parents of noble birth. After the war, he joined the British Colonial Service as a game scout. This biography gives an account of East African history told from an Afrocentric perspective.
author: Bror Macdonell
